Narrative:
I totally agree with this argument. 
Lets face the facts.

 The low-income societies are facing the twin challenges of rising costs and difficulty in access to food grains. 

No doubt that India have  have adequate stocks, yet the pricss are going up in a manner that is  unjustified. 

It is clear that hoarding and speculation is at work everywhere. 

At the same time dont forget this. India  is donating 50,000 Metric tonnes of wheat to Afghanistan.
Another 10,000 tons of rice and wheat is being supplied to Myanmar.
Title: Wheat export ban by India is justified
